entry.title: Talk 'Till There's No Lies
entry.summary:
Author: Skeletons_InYourCloset

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,340Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 20

Summary: For the record, Hal would like to say this was not his fault. After all, that girl was really hot—think of a desert storm wrapped in a human form, with hair like dust devils swirling in the sunset and a smile that could make a monk rethink his vows—and that's what he was up against. Anyone would’ve been distracted, okay? Superman would've taken a little longer to blink. Batman would’ve pretended he wasn’t affected, then brooded about it for six months. And Hal? Hal forgot where he was and long story short—she kissed him. When he pulled back, dazed and grinning like an idiot, his ring was gone. Next thing he knew, he was waking up—hands cuffed, ring still absent, ego thoroughly bruised. Now, it wasn’t like this was Hal’s first time getting kidnapped. Far from it. But this? This was a first. No alien warlords. No cosmic entities. Just… a woman hired to lure him in for some wacko wanting to get dirt on, here's the kicker, Spooky of all people. Crazy, right? Or, Hal gets kidnapped by your average Gotham crazy wanting to get a step ahead of Batman and ends up being saved like a damsel in distress. Bruce is, surprisingly, overprotective—bordering on solicitous—about the whole thing.

entry.title: Craving You
entry.summary:
Author: Radiioblabla

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,029Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 84

Summary: Earlier, Hal had been convinced that Bruce couldn’t do anything to him now that they were in a public setting and he was stripped of his Batman gear, but obviously that didn’t stop him from terrorizing Hal in other ways. He’d kind of brought it upon himself as well, but that by no means justified Bruce out-flirting him, dammit.   OR Bruce is forced to reveal his identity for an undercover mission at a gala and Hal gets to meet the menace that is Brucie Wayne for the first time (and eventually also gets a taste of him). Also features third-wheel Oliver Queen and supportive bff Clark Kent bc why not :) This is how it goes, basically; Hal, sarcastically: you must be fun at parties Batman’s Brucie slipping out: oh baby you have no idea

entry.title: live on in your eyes and not your mind
entry.summary:
Author: HC_Carter12

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,945Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 53

Summary: Despite what Clark seemed to think, Bruce was not nervous. Bruce was not only the third richest man in the world, a competent businessman and a father of seven. He was the goddamn Batman. Batman didn’t get nervous. “I’m just saying it would make sense if you were nervous about today,” said Clark, ignoring Bruce’s glare. “It’s not every day you have to interview your dead mom- who it turns out hasn’t been dead in years- because she magically mentored a former friend while he was dead, because now that friend has come back to life as well.” Bruce felt his eye begin to twitch behind the cowl’s lens. “Shut up, Clark.”   Hal Jordan was brought back to life, which would be great if it didn't involve Martha Wayne also being alive and Bruce not knowing a thing about it.

entry.title: I'll ruin it all over. And over like I always do
entry.summary:
Author: natz13

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,550Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 103

Summary: “Why am I here?” was empty. He thought about closure, but closure had been given to him the day Clark told him they were done. So lost in the question, he was rudely interrupted by the sudden attention the crowd gave to the door opening and revealing the woman he should hate. Lois Lane, the perfect reporter, was just a really good friend, he was told. But he doesn't, not when he understands why the election of having everything he could never offer was faced to Clark.With the music playing, and Clark's sight suddenly not in him anymore, for the first time in his life, he did what many never thought he would do. “Fuck this, I'm leaving.” He chose himself.

entry.title: don't go in there, you'll become one
entry.summary:
Author: victini_cresoon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,044Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Really, Bruce should have expected it to happen eventually. Trapped in an alternate universe, stuck in a body much younger than he was before having his soul dragged somewhere it did not belong, he falls head first into the lives of gods, monsters, magic, and everything inbetween. Quite frankly, he just wants to go home to his family, glowstick of a boyfriend, and most importantly his dog. Too bad souls from his world have started leaking into this one. It would be a disaster if he was the only one who could help. or;bruce gets trapped in the percy jackson universe! shenanigans ensue

entry.title: Borderline
entry.summary:
Author: Captain_Kinky

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,261Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 634

Summary: “Bruce?” Hal dubiously asked as if questioning whether his sight betrayed him, the pep in his step immediately faltering.“Oh, you two know each other?” Carol asked, distancing herself from the handsome billionaire.“No, I’m afraid we don’t.” Bruce turned to Hal, and his words were a pointed warning. “After all, what would a billionaire and a test pilot have in common before now, hm?”“Right, right. No, uh, I just mean… Bruce Wayne. Crazy to see a billionaire here.” Hal came closer to the pair, leaning closer to the man as he managed to grit out, “Why are you here?”“Well, Mr. Jordan–”“Hal is fine.”“I was hoping to fund a new project for Ferris Air, and I’ve selected you as my test pilot.”trying to update weekly / bi-weekly this year (2026) until completed! come join the batlantern discord server!

entry.title: Gotham is the worst
entry.summary:
Author: Frey_S

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,186Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 623

Summary: On top of Hal's list of things he hates are three things: charity galas, Gotham and Batman. So of course he ends up dealing with all of those in one night, even if he doesn't technically know he ends up sleeping with that last one. He's never letting Carol drag him to rich people events ever again. In which Hal dates Bruce Wayne. Tells him he's Green Lantern. Breaks up with him. And then sort of dates Batman without knowing that he is in fact sleeping with Bruce Wayne again.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Hal Jordan (Green Lantern)/Bruce Wayne
  • Hal Jordan (Green Lantern)

  • Bottom Hal Jordan (Green Lantern)
  • Angst with a Happy Ending
  • even if we start of with little to no angst
  • Praise Kink
  • Anal Sex
  • Anal Fingering
  • Nobody knows who Batman is but Batman knows everybody else's secret identity
  • Oral Sex
  • They both have commitment issues in their own way
  • mentioned past Hal/Carol
  • Minor Roy Harper/Jason Todd
  • mostly implied - Freeform
